name: MineClone (ZeroStudios)
description:
A QuadroCraft Sequel...

Now with better things, more music, a Social Media to download Maps, Mods and Texture Packs !!!

MineClone comes with these 5 Apps:

MineClone Free

The Lite version of MineClone, has the basic things for a good experience, with Multiplayer Support, only some skins available, not supported for mods.

MineClone+

A better version of MineClone, comes with music, mods support, all skins and a better mobile interface.

MineMods

An app to put mods, texture pack and more to MineClone+, not compatible for MineClone Free.

MineClone Host

An app to make a server directly in your phone for MineClone, (for make public, you need to open ports on your router configuration)

MineChat

An app to talk with other players of MineClone, upload your Videos, Worlds, Mods and Texture Packs !!

Enjoy a world with infinite possibilities, from building a house to entering the depths of hell.

You decide, if you want to play alone or with your close friends.

You decide, if start your adventure in survival mode or testing your creativity.

You decide how your adventure will begin.

And you decide, how your adventure will end...

What are you waiting for to be the hero of your story, get MineClone Free and start your adventure !

Minimum Requirements:

Android 4.0

1.5 GHz Quad-Core Processor

1GB of RAM

Recommended Requirements:

Android 5.1

2 GHz Octa-Core Processor

3GB of RAM
